Why Africa for Your BPO Needs?

The Next Frontier in Global Outsourcing

Africa’s rapidly growing tech ecosystem, young talent pool, and expanding infrastructure make it the ideal destination for BPO companies looking to scale globally. By tapping into Africa’s skilled workforce, your business can reduce operational costs while driving innovation and maintaining high-quality standards.

Key Statistics

  • Over 60% of Africa’s population is under 25, making it the youngest workforce in the world.
  • Projected to have the fastest-growing middle class, increasing demand for tech-driven solutions.
  • Africa is seeing rapid growth in internet penetration, reaching over 43% of the population.

GetGlobal’s BPO Support Package

Custom Workforce Solutions to Drive Your BPO Success

At GetGlobal by TeleSoftas, we specialize in aligning international BPO companies with top African talent. Our tailored solutions ensure your operations run smoothly, efficiently, and with the right skills to meet your business demands.

Key Features:

  • Custom Talent Development: We work backward from your specific job needs, training African professionals in the exact skills you require.
  • Scalable Workforce: Whether you need 10 or 100 employees, we provide talent that’s ready to scale with your business.
  • End-to-End Support: From recruitment and onboarding to performance management, we handle every aspect of talent acquisition and development.
  • BPO Specialization: BPO Specialization: Our talent is specifically trained in customer service, tech support, data entry, and other critical BPO functions.

The Talent Refinery – Bridging the Skills Gap

Empowering Africa’s Workforce, Elevating Your Business

Our Talent Refinery is a key part of our process, ensuring that every professional we provide is trained and reskilled to meet the highest global standards. We collaborate with international BPOs to design custom training programs that focus on your exact operational needs.

{/*

How We Do It:

  • Targeted Training Programs: We start by understanding your operational requirements and develop training pathways to equip local talent with the skills needed.
  • Job-Ready Talent: Our graduates are primed to deliver from day one, whether in customer service, data management, or technical roles.
  • Continuous Upskilling: We offer ongoing training to ensure that your workforce evolves with industry trends and new technologies.
